thread.title: Accountingfly CEO Jeff Phillips In Accounting Today’s Top 100 Most Influential People List
thread.title_full: Accountingfly CEO Jeff Phillips In Accounting Today’s Top 100 Most Influential People List

author: Jeff Phillips
title: Accountingfly CEO Jeff Phillips In Accounting Today’s Top 100 Most Influential People List
text:
Accountingfly, the accounting profession’s online career community, today announced its CEO, Jeff Phillips, has been named one of the Top 100 Most Influential People by Accounting Today. “It’s a tremendous honor to be included in this list alongside many of our friends, partners and role models in the accounting profession,” said Jeff Phillips, CEO of Accountingfly. “This recognition is a testament to the work done by the entire Accountingfly team and it wouldn’t be possible without partners like AICPA PCPS, Xero and Boomer Consulting.”
The Accounting Today Top 100 Most Influential People list pulls together the top thought leaders and visionaries who are shaping the accounting profession. Accounting Today is the leading provider of business news for the tax and accounting community, offering breaking news, in-depth features, insightful editorial analysis, and a host of resources and services.
In the announcement made by Accounting Today, Phillips is described as “leading a revolution in the way accounting firms recruit staff--and just in time too, as firms and accountants alike are discovering that the old way isn’t serving anyone’s needs.”
Jeff Phillips has over ten years of online recruitment experience. He started Accountingfly in 2012 with John and James Hosman, and his team is effectively bridging the gap between early-career CPAs and accounting employers. The Accountingfly network continues to grow and its clients’ postings appear in 20,000 job searches per month with an average posting being seen 70 times per month. The company is also building a wealth of resources for the accounting industry through ‘Meet This Firm’ videos, webinars, online events, virtual career fairs, and other activities.
The announcement comes on the heels of the company announcing that it has acquired GoingConcern.com, a leading accounting news publication.
For more information about Accountingfly, visit accountingfly.com .
About Accountingfly
Accountingfly is the accounting profession’s online career community. Employers use Accountingfly to streamline the recruitment and hiring process of interns, early career and experienced accountants. Candidates create profiles to search for and apply to jobs, and have the option of making their profile private or visible to recruiters. Along the way, Accountingfly provides support and resources to accountants help ensure a successful career.
